A4.text: any being, if it vary however slightly in any manner profitable to itself, under the complex and sometimes varying conditions of life, will have a better chance of surviving, and thus be naturally selected.

A5.text: showing adaptation of their flowers to attract specific moths to each species and ensure cross-fertilisation.
